Sentencas: State-of-the-art solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) are based on oxide ion conducting zirconia electrolytes, typically doped by yttria or scandia.
Titulo: Dense Y-doped ion conducting perovskite films of BaZrO3, BaSnO3, and BaCeO3 for SOFC applications produced by powder aerosol deposition at room temperature

Sentencas: Major drawback of these systems are their high operation temperatures of 800 degrees C and above.
Titulo: Dense Y-doped ion conducting perovskite films of BaZrO3, BaSnO3, and BaCeO3 for SOFC applications produced by powder aerosol deposition at room temperature

Sentencas: These are necessary for a sufficient ionic conductivity.
Titulo: Dense Y-doped ion conducting perovskite films of BaZrO3, BaSnO3, and BaCeO3 for SOFC applications produced by powder aerosol deposition at room temperature

Sentencas: Instead of oxide ions, also protonic charge carriers could be used in SOFC.
Titulo: Dense Y-doped ion conducting perovskite films of BaZrO3, BaSnO3, and BaCeO3 for SOFC applications produced by powder aerosol deposition at room temperature

Sentencas: The material classes of barium zirconates (BaZrO3), barium stannates (BaSnO3), and barium cerates (BaCeO3) are described as good proton conductors, especially when the B-site of the ABO(3) perovskite structure is aliovalently doped by yttria.
Titulo: Dense Y-doped ion conducting perovskite films of BaZrO3, BaSnO3, and BaCeO3 for SOFC applications produced by powder aerosol deposition at room temperature

Sentencas: Their protonic conductivity values in the moderate temperature regime up to 600 degrees C are comparable to YSZ at 800 degrees C, making these compounds ideal candidates for a usage in future SOFC.
Titulo: Dense Y-doped ion conducting perovskite films of BaZrO3, BaSnO3, and BaCeO3 for SOFC applications produced by powder aerosol deposition at room temperature

Sentencas: Unfortunately, very high sintering temperatures up to 1800 degrees C are required to process dense and therefore gastight solid electrolyte membranes.
Titulo: Dense Y-doped ion conducting perovskite films of BaZrO3, BaSnO3, and BaCeO3 for SOFC applications produced by powder aerosol deposition at room temperature

Sentencas: However, a novel spray coating method called powder aerosol deposition (PAD, also known as AD) enables to form fully dense ceramic films directly at room temperature without any necessary sintering processes.
Titulo: Dense Y-doped ion conducting perovskite films of BaZrO3, BaSnO3, and BaCeO3 for SOFC applications produced by powder aerosol deposition at room temperature

Sentencas: Films are deposited from ceramic powders that are accelerated by a dry carrier gas flow under vacuum conditions.
Titulo: Dense Y-doped ion conducting perovskite films of BaZrO3, BaSnO3, and BaCeO3 for SOFC applications produced by powder aerosol deposition at room temperature

Sentencas: In this work, we investigated the film formation of three different barium based perovskite ceramics, namely yttria doped barium zirconate, barium stannate, and barium cerate by powder aerosol deposition.
Titulo: Dense Y-doped ion conducting perovskite films of BaZrO3, BaSnO3, and BaCeO3 for SOFC applications produced by powder aerosol deposition at room temperature

Sentencas: The optical and mechanical quality of films was evaluated using scanning electron microscopy and microhardness indentation and their crystallographic properties were characterized by X-ray diffraction.
Titulo: Dense Y-doped ion conducting perovskite films of BaZrO3, BaSnO3, and BaCeO3 for SOFC applications produced by powder aerosol deposition at room temperature

Sentencas: The electrical behavior was analyzed by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy and DC polarization methods up to temperatures of 1000 degrees C and 800 degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: Dense Y-doped ion conducting perovskite films of BaZrO3, BaSnO3, and BaCeO3 for SOFC applications produced by powder aerosol deposition at room temperature

Sentencas: Furthermore, a preliminary study about the film formation on porous electrodes was conducted.
Titulo: Dense Y-doped ion conducting perovskite films of BaZrO3, BaSnO3, and BaCeO3 for SOFC applications produced by powder aerosol deposition at room temperature
